paramagpy.fit.cantor_pairing¶

paramagpy.fit.cantor_pairing(a, b)[source]¶

Map two integers to a single integer. The mapped space is minimum size. Ordering matters in this case. see Bijective mapping f:ZxZ->N.

Parameters:
  • a (int) –
  • b (int) –
Returns:

c – bijective mapping (a, b) -> c
Return type:

int
